Producer: Randall Emmett, George Furla, Rodney Omanoff, Jeff Rice, Rafi Stephan
Distributor: here! Films, Xscapade Pictures Ltd. [gb], Regent Entertainment [us]
Production Co: Speedway Junkie, Inc., Magic Entertainment, Inc., Powers That Be Pictures, Miracle Entertainment
Synopsis: Running away from home to pursue his dreams of becoming a professional racecar driver, Johnny (Jesse Bradford) is a high school kid from a good family. He winds up in Las Vegas working two-bit crimes. No closer to his destination - the race tracks of North Carolina - Johnny has a long way to go, but he is not without hope.
Title: Speedway Junky
